# Simple Exercise on Overfitting

First set p=n

```{r}

set.seed(123)
n <- 1000

p <- n
x <- matrix(rnorm(n * p), n, p)
y <- rnorm(n)

print("p/n is")
print(p / n)
print("R2 is")
print(summary(lm(y ~ x))$r.squared)
print("Adjusted R2 is")
print(summary(lm(y ~ x))$adj.r.squared)
```

Second, set p=n/2.

```{r}

set.seed(123)
n <- 1000

p <- n / 2
x <- matrix(rnorm(n * p), n, p)
y <- rnorm(n)

print("p/n is")
print(p / n)
print("R2 is")
print(summary(lm(y ~ x))$r.squared)
print("Adjusted R2 is")
print(summary(lm(y ~ x))$adj.r.squared)
```

Third, set p/n =.05

```{r}

set.seed(123)
n <- 1000

p <- .05 * n
x <- matrix(rnorm(n * p), n, p)
y <- rnorm(n)

print("p/n is")
print(p / n)
print("R2 is")
print(summary(lm(y ~ x))$r.squared)
print("Adjusted R2 is")
print(summary(lm(y ~ x))$adj.r.squared)
```
